name: Homeless Care Kit Donation
description:
This holiday season we had a lot of things lined up utilizing the fashion truck to give back to the community. Unfortunately we have had a few snags and it is not ready yet to do the events we had planned. That being said we decided on some other ways to give back. Amongst them are weekly and as of late, daily random acts of kindness. One of those things is 'homeless care kits'. Included is daily grooming necessities, as well as a pair of gloves, socks, hat, small medical kit, a plastic tub to keep everything in and dry and more. These cost $25 to put together and I'm attempting to give out at least one a week. With your help we can make it more often. I will have an item listing on our webstore where you can donate $5, $10, $15, $20 or $25 that we will put 100% toward making more kits. Together we can make a world of difference; one random act of kindness at a time. 

**unless specified in notes to seller not to, all care kits will include the names of those who made donations to have that kit supplied.**

#rockeverywear #raok #randomactofkindness #giveback #homelesskit #holiday #giving #homeless

name: Custom Hand-Drawn Shoes [Vans, Converse, Toms]
description:
READ THIS INFORMATION THOROUGHLY! IT EXPLAINS THE PROCESS!

These are hand drawn and colored by me. You can custom order about any theme shoe you would like.

They are sealed and waterproofed for long lasting design in all elements of weather. 

Price includes me suppling the shoes.

Upon purchase you will be contacted at your email address to discuss your design and size of shoe. Please be sure to have an updated email address associated with your purchase. If you feel you have not received an email please email us at rockeverywear@gmail.com 

Please allow up to 4 weeks for your shoes to arrive. The process of creating them can take some time. We first have to finalize the design with you. Then I have to start drawing them and coloring them. Finally I seal them and waterproof them. That has to set before shipping. Not to mention I typically have more then 1 order going on at all times so please be patient. If you need them by a certain time please contact me first.

name: Studded Converse Chuck Taylors
description:
**IMPORTANT - MUST READ - EXPLAINS THE PROCESS AND DETAILS TO YOU ABOUT ORDERING THESE SHOES** 

Choose the color of Chuck Taylors High Tops you want and whether you want gold or silver studs then we custom make these for you. 

Make sure you know your size in Converse as they run slightly bigger then normal shoes. I always recommend trying a pair on at the store to be positive about size. Also make sure you pay attention to the Men/Womens sizing when you try them on so you can accurately give us which of the 2 sizes you need. (i.e. Mens Size 8 = Womens Size 10) 

In the notes to seller put the color converse you would like and if you want gold or silver studs. They are 1/2" studs that we use. 

If you would like a different design or style of studs please contact us so we can arrange a custom order for you!

name: Ohio WINdians Unisex Crew
description:

Forget the Cleveland Indians... Bring on the Ohio Windians and show your support by being the first one to rock these RockEveryWear exclusives, and the first installment of the TribeTown collection.  

Thanks to Nick Mancuso for helping with the wonderful description! 

NOTICE: These shirts are unisex sized. For women ordering, order 1 size down the size you wear in women's. [i.e. if you wear a women's medium order a unisex small.]

name: Ombre Dyed & Distressed Shorts
description: These shorts are each made to order just for you. Each pair will vary slightly as they are hand bleached, dyed, distressed and studded one at a time. This makes them unique to you and no two pairs are identical. Ordering consists of a couple options: Supplying of garment: - I can supply the item for you for $35 and your choice of either of the 2 designs listed. **NOTE** If I supply the garment I will need for you to put in the comments to seller section the following info: - waist diameter in inches. Using a pair of your current jeans measure the opening from side to side. - length from waist to leg opening in inches for how long you want the leg length. - You can send us a pair of your old jeans or shorts and have us use those for your custom shorts. This option is $25.

name: Travis 'The Terror' Clark MMA Fight Shirt
description:
rockEVERYwear sponsorship tee for Travis Clark. Evolve Fight Team MMA fighter. We are very honored to be apart of what Travis is creating for himself. He is a wonderful guy and truly deserves the title he has won. 

Travis Clark was born in Steubenville, OH in 1979. By the age of 13 he had already had his first amateur boxing contest. Growing up in Morristown Ohio, Travis looked for a way to showcase his athleticism and combat spirit. Recruited to wrestle by Rick Link, local coaching guru, Travis dominated his opponents on his way to a Ohio State Title in 1998. Taking several years off from competition, and searching for an outlet, Travis decided to try his hand at kickboxing where after just a short time training he won the 2007 and 2008 Kickboxing National Championships. Later in 2008 Travis decided to try his hand at the state Toughman Competition where he again dominated winning the West Virginia Championship. Turning his talents to MMA in 2009, Travis found his true calling in the Cage. Winning his first 6 fights as an amateur, Travis decided to turn Pro where he is undefeated with 3 straight victories. Travis trains with the Evolve Fight Team in North East Ohio with coaches, UFC Veteran and World Class Kickboxer, Ryan Madigan, Elite Wrestler and NCAA Finalist Clint Musser, BJJ legend Ricardo Pires and Renowned Strength and Conditioning Coach Shaun Hinssen. Travis has credited Evolve for changing his career and giving him the tools to go to the next level. Now Competing at 185lbs, Travis uses his sons Kade and Kohl as Inspiration and motivation to train with unparalleled intensity every day.

name: Invisible Children Kony 2012 Non-Profit Tee
description:
Joseph Kony is one of the worlds worst war criminals and I support the international effort to arrest him, disarm the LRA and bring the child soldiers home. If the world knows who Joseph Kony is, it will unite to stop him. It starts here. 

100% of the proceeds from this tee will go to the Invisible Children Kony 2012 campaign to bring awareness about the abuse inflicted by Joseph Kony and aid in his capture this year. 

Visit www.invisiblechildren.com for more info.

name: Akron Flexfit Fitted Hat
description:
rockEVERYwear Akron Fitted Hat

These can be custom ordered to fit your needs. Thread will match colors of the hat unless you specify on 2-tone hats. Thread color for the solid black hat is red and white. 

For $5 more you can choose the custom hat option which allows you to pick which hat color you want and what you would like the thread color to be.

For a $15 upgrade you can get something of your choice painted on the bill. For that choose the upgraded option and we will contact you to discuss the paintjob of your choice.

Sizes are:

S/M (6 3/4" - 7 1/4") 
L/XL (7 1/8" - 7 5/8") 

Hats are made to order. Allow 10 days for product arrival.

name: REW Logo Snapback
description:
"Snapbacks Back, Snapbacks Back
Thats all these dudes saying, I brought Snapbacks back!"

Classic rockeverywear Logo SnapBack. 

These are also custom order-able with the logo in different color thread and the bill paint-job to match the thread you choose. 

For a $15 upgrade you can get something of your choice painted on the bill. For that choose the upgraded option and we will contact you to discuss the paintjob of your choice. 

Snapbacks have adjustable snap strap. One size fits most.

name: N.B.S. Squad New Era Snapback
description:
Custom Designed New Era's we did for N.B.S. Music Group. Order their standard black and white version or customize it with the logo in a thread color of your choice and get the underside of the brim hand-painted with whatever you choose. 

Please review all 4 options to make sure you pick the correct one:

1 - Black hat w/ White logo (no painted brim)
2 - Black hat w/ Logo color of your choice (no painted brim)
3 - Black hat w/ White logo & Custom painted brim
4 - Black hat w/ Logo color of your choice & Custom painted brim

If you choose Option 2, 3 or 4 we will contact you via email to get the thread color you want and what you would like painted on the underside of the brim.

options.name: Black w/ White logo & custom paint

description:

You can order these in either the standard art print or a framed version. Each is signed and numbered with the edition.

You can also order these in a custom color scheme if you choose in which you can swap out the current colors for a color scheme that would match your household. For custom colors please contact us at rockeverywear@gmail.com with your request following your purchase.

name: Handmade Messenger Bag w/ Laptop Pocket
description:
Handmade Messenger Bag made with canvas and Home Decor Fabric. 

Features:
- 5 slot exterior pocket with 3 spots for pens or pencils
- Padded interior laptop pocket*
- 2 slot interior pocket
- Snap closure 

*Fits a standard 15" laptop

Custom orders available to fit smaller or larger laptops. Use the form on our contact page to message us about a custom order. Custom color options available as well.

name: Custom Order Owl Pillow
description: Don't see a predesigned owl pillow that suits your needs? Have us custom make you one for your special occasion. Baby Shower? We can make it fit the color scheme you need. Special holiday like Christmas that you want it for... We will make it Christmas themed. Whatever you desire.

name: Rockeverywear Gift Certificate
description:
Perfect gift for any occasion. Not sure what size your special someone wears or what they would pick out... get them a gift certificate and let them make the hard decisions themselves! 

Upon purchase YOU will be mailed your gift certificate with the proper value and a unique redemption code. You can then give the gift certificate to your recipient. 

If you would like a different dollar amount please email us to request that so we can post it for you. 

No Cash Value. 
Good for 6 months. 
Redemption value does not include tax.
